data.prayer: Spirit, teach those feeling unsafe in Niari, Republic of Congo that they can hide under your wings
data.verse: He will cover you with his feathers, and under his wings you will find refuge; his faithfulness will be your shield and rampart.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Niari, Republic of Congo
data.section_summary: What beauty can God be thanked for in this photo?

data.prayer: Father, you desire the people in the state of Niari who are far from you to hear about you.
data.verse: "Those who were not told about him will see, and those who have not heard will understand."

data.prayer: Father, please raise up prophets in Niari who can call the church to holiness and purity, preparing your church as a bride for your Son.
data.verse: So Christ himself gave the apostles, the prophets, the evangelists, the pastors and teachers, to equip his people for works of service, so that the body of Christ may be built up

data.prayer: Father, knowing that teachers will be judged more strictly, help the local leaders in Niari, Republic of Congo to be careful with their words.
data.verse: Not many of you should become teachers, my brothers, for you know that we who teach will be judged with greater strictness.

data.prayer: Lord God, I thank you that the blood of Christ, who through the eternal Spirit offered himself without defect to God, can cleanse the Arab people conscience from dead works to serve the living God.
Father, your Word can be a lamp to the feet of the 164,012 people in the state of Niari who claim to know you, if they open it and read it today.
data.verse: your Word is a lamp to my feet and a light to my path.

data.prayer: Spirit, please start new house churches in every neighborhood of the state of Niari.
data.verse: For the earth will be filled with the knowledge of the glory of the Lord as the waters cover the sea.

data.prayer: Lord, cause a passion for prayer among the people of Niari, Republic of Congo.
data.verse: I [Jesus] pray also for those who will believe in me through their message, that all of them may be one, Father, just as you are in me and I am in you. May they also be in us so that the world may believe that you have sent me.

location.name: Niari
location.people_groups_list: Teke, Northern, South Asian, general, Arab, Hausa, Pygmy, Bayaka
location.people_groups_list_w_pop: Teke, Northern (87,000), South Asian, general (190,000), Arab (1,200), Hausa (11,000), Pygmy, Bayaka (41,000)
